text: to (he nabee!) sambhavatah aap usamen se kuchh ko, jo aapakee or prakaashana kee ja rahee hai, tyaag dene vaale hain aur isake kaaran aapaka dil sikud raha hai ki ve kahate hain ki isapar koee kosh kyon nahin utaara gaya ya isake saath koee pharishta kyon (nahin) aaya? (to sunie) aapakeval sachet karane vaale hain aur allaah hee pratyek cheez par rakshak hai
